turns.content: Let's review your geographic preferences. I see you've selected only Zone A and excluded several zones.
Yes, I only want to work in Zone A. I've heard the other areas aren't safe.

I understand your concern about safety. Let me check our safety map for the latest information. According to our current safety map, Zone B and Zone C are both classified as 'low risk' areas. Zone D is 'medium risk' but has high patient demand. Only Zone E is currently flagged as 'high risk'.
Oh, I didn't know that. I was just being cautious.

That's completely understandable! Based on the safety data, you might want to consider adding Zone B and Zone C to your preferred areas — they're both low risk and have good patient demand. This would significantly increase your available assignments. Zone D also has many patients who need help, though I understand if you'd prefer to stick with low-risk areas for now.
I'll think about adding Zone B. Thanks for the information.

You're welcome! I'll note that you're currently limited to Zone A but may expand to Zone B. I'd recommend revisiting this after your first few assignments. Would you like me to set a reminder to review your geographic preferences in two weeks?

actions: Offered to set reminder for preference review
remediation_steps_offered: Review geographic preferences in two weeks
